attributes.action: Change the voting age to 16 to give the majority of people the right to speak out and stand for our rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If this petition goes through those under 18 will finally be able to get a vote as after 16 you tend to be classed as an adult as you make the choices now in your life and where you want to go so why not let them vote at this age and allow them to stand for election. This will boost the number of voters and also give a chance for underspoken for groups to be heard.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
